TopicTitle: More Realistic Aero for Rocket Scientist Mode

Articles.Content: We’ve already discussed the specifics here on the forum. Personally I want to be able to take my airplanes in Kerbal 2 further. So far though, other than the procedural wings the aero system feels the same. I think it would be nice for there to be an optional more advanced aero system so that players that want a more realistic experience can have that, but it keeps the casual community happy. What do you think?
